title: Ebony - Novel Updates
genre: Drama   Fantasy   Josei   Mature   Romance   Slice of Life   Tragedy
tags: Abusive Characters   Adapted to Manhwa   Aristocracy   Caring Protagonist   Character Growth   Couple Growth   Early Romance   Fantasy World   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Marriage   Nobles   Past Trauma   Prison   Royalty
author: Jaya   자야
description:
Evony Vonieck's days are numbered. She has been sentenced to death for murdering her father and fiancé. She's saved when a guardian arranges for her release, sending her to the Duke's castle.

What she expects is the job of a housemaid, or worse, being chained in an underground dungeon, and starving to death. But Grand Duke Schneider's behavior towards her isn't cruel.

What is the meaning of his generosity? And will Evony be able to adapt to her new life?>
